extendedInfo.description: + OverviewIt is a timer application, high-performance simple.Stopwatch basic, from countdown timer,I can be used in a variety of applications to high-performance stopwatch. -- I selected this hotel as a top choice -- I want a stopwatch free -- In the stopwatch running -- I want to use as a kitchen timer in everyday cooking -- I want to measure the game play time Pazudora, such as Mobage -- We want to measure the ranking time and stopwatch one+ Features -- Energy-saving specifications -- Simple -- Resident unnecessary -- Power OFF response -- 99 hours -- 1/100 seconds -- Countdown -- Count up -- The update is due a stop watch in the future!*Function+Basic functions-------------------------"Stopwatch" - Count up timer for simple - 1/100 seconds - maximum measurement is 99 hours 59 minutes and 59 seconds  - Total time and lap time - Copy and paste the corresponding measurement time-------------------------"Countdown" - Digital timer and timer circle - Repeat function of countdown - Alarm response-------------------------+High functionality-------------------------"Multi-stopwatch" - Run the stopwatch at the same time - Timer name setting - 1/100 seconds - maximum measurement is 99 hours 59 minutes and 59 seconds -------------------------"Multi-countdown" - Run the countdown at the same time - Timer name setting - Or re-configuration of timer time - maximum measurement is 99 hours 59 minutes and 59 seconds -------------------------"Ranking Timer" - Simultaneous measurement at multiple timers - Ranking (ranking) display function - Timer name setting - 1/100 seconds-------------------------*Support DeviceAndroidOS 2.2 and beyond.*Permission+VIBRATEãâVibrate the mobile phone when the alarm..+INTERNET,ACCESS_NETWORK_STATEãâCommunication part (Ads) will use.*Feedback This app analyzes access in order to improve the application. We ask you to feedback about bugs and ideas. Please send e-mail to 'mobaegg_dev@mobaegg.com'  or post User Reviews on Google Play!

reviews.title: Almost perfect.
reviews.comment: Could use some configuration options like alarm sound selection and volume plus vibrate toggle.  Option to select startup screen. Ability to move timers to reorganize them (I use about 8 at any one time as a chef).
reviews.author: Kapila Hazelett

reviews.title: Great Timer
reviews.comment: Beautiful Holo interface, and great functionality, but English text needs improvement. Also, an option to show a notification with timer controls would be useful.
reviews.author: Jonathan Morford
